Class Action

java.lang.Object
com.calcgame.main.Action
public abstract class Action extends Object
Represents an input action from the player, contains functions to execute and (optionally) undo it.
It should also store the context of this action (i.e. which button was clicked, it's position and container)
See Also:
  • redo()
  • undoInternal()
  • undoable()

  • Field Details

    • name

      public final String name
      The name of the action, used for logging purposes

  • Constructor Details

    • Action

      public Action(String name)
      Constructs a new action with the specified name, requires all abstract functions to be defined
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this action

  • Method Details

    • redo

      public final void redo()
      Does (or redoes) the action.

    • redoInternal

      protected abstract void redoInternal()
      Should do (or redo) the action.

    • undo

      public final void undo()
      Undoes the action. It should not be invoked if undoable() returns false.

    • undoInternal

      protected abstract void undoInternal()
      Should undo the action. It should not be invoked if undoable() returns false.

    • undoable

      public abstract boolean undoable()
      It should be noted that any class that uses this class may disregard this function's return value, and still invoke undoInternal(), though it is not recommended.
      Returns:
      whether undoInternal() is supposed to be invoked.

    • getContext

      @Nullable public @Nullable ActionContext getContext()
      Returns this action's context
      Returns:
      this action's context, may be null

    • setContext

      public void setContext(@Nullable @Nullable ActionContext context)
      Sets this Action's context
      Parameters:
      context - the context to set, may be null

    • andThen

      public Action andThen(Action other)
      Returns an Action, which has the parent's undo() and redo(), followed by other.undo() and other.redo(). undoable() only returns true if both the parent and other are undoable. Inherits context only from its parent (this)
      Parameters:
      other - the Action, methods from which to invoke after the parent's methods
      Returns:
      a new Action object, or this if super.andThen was already invoked with the same parameter

    • forFunction

      public static Action forFunction(Runnable f, String name)
      Returns an Action object, which runs the specified function in redo(), and does nothing in undo(). The result Action is not undoable, and it's context is null
      Parameters:
      f - the function to run in redo()
      name - the name of the action
      Returns:
      a new Action object

    • forUndo

      public static Action forUndo(Runnable f, String name)
      Returns an Action object, which runs the specified function in undo(), and does nothing in redo(). The result Action is undoable, and it's context is null
      Parameters:
      f - the function to run in undo()
      name - the name of the action
      Returns:
      a new Action object
